details.top: When The Prophet (sal-Allaahu 'alayhe wa sallam) would enter upon a sick person, he would say:
details.arabic_diacless: لا بأس طهور إن شاء اللٰه
details.arabic: لَا بَأْسَ طَهُوْرٌ إِنْ شَاءَ اللّٰهُ
details.translations: Do not worry, it will be a purification (for you), Allah willing.
